features: Waterproof, breathable 2.5L Gore-Tex Paclite® fabric maximizes packability for everyday protection
Fully seam-sealed to lock out moisture
Hook and loop adjustable waist with durable elastic tabs for versatile, secure fit
Full-length side zip for easy on-off without removing boots
Snap ankle and upper calf closure with secondary attachment point for optional slimmer fit
One low-profile hook and loop back pocket securely protects small essentials
Two stirrup loops inside each ankle hem for optional security under boots
